greetings.title: Welcome to Our Product
text: Experience a new standard in modern solutions. Our product is crafted to meet the highest expectations in performance, design, and usability.
Built with innovation at its core, it adapts effortlessly to your needs — whether simple or complex.
Streamlined, reliable, and future-ready — it's everything you need, without the distractions you don't.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: We offer several pricing plans tailored to different needs, so you can easily find the one that suits your workflow.
pricing.button: Let’s find the right plan for you!

items.question: Can I use the product for free?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial with full access for 30 days. No credit card required.

items.question: What happens after my trial ends?
items.answer: You can choose a subscription plan that fits your needs, or simply let the trial expire with no charges.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and never share your data with third parties.

items.question: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Of course! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time from your account settings.
